news_header: Hong Kong's Ocean Park has introduced twin panda cubs, drawing large crowds for their debut. The cubs, temporarily named 'Elder Sister' and 'Little Brother', are part of a naming competition.
news_original_title: Panda-stic! Twin cubs attract hundreds of visitors on debut
news_text: Their mother, Ying Ying, is the oldest giant panda to give birth. The text also discusses various global events, including a religious gathering in India, air pollution measures in Thailand, and political unrest in South Korea.
